newsitem.title: UK: RESEARCH ALERT - BT raised at Lehman.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - BT raised at Lehman.

text.p: British Telecommunications Plc was raised to a "buy" from "outperform" at Lehman Brothers, a research note from analysts at the brokerage said on Friday.
The note said Lehman also raised its pre-tax profit estimates for BT to 3.200 billion from 3.085 billion in fiscal 1997 and to 3.350 million stg from 3.100 million for the year after.
It said the stock, up 4-1/2 at 374 by 1035 GMT, should be bought up to 400p.

The upgrades come after BT on Thursday posted better-than-expected first-half results and said it was fending off increasingly tough competition with successful marketing initiatives. -- David Holmes, London Newsroom +44 171 542 5106
